title: Sound On: LA Mayor Race Divides Hollywood, McConaughey on Gun Laws
itunes:title: Sound On: LA Mayor Race Divides Hollywood, McConaughey on Gun Laws
description:
Greg Giroux, Bloomberg Government elections reporter discussed the primary elections to watch today in 7 states, Emily Wilkins, Bloomberg Government Congress reporter discussed the latest on negotiations in the Senate to write legislation addressing recent mass shootings, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discussed celebrity endorsements in the LA mayor race, what congress can achieve on gun control measures and actor Matthew McConaughey's emotional plea for new gun controls during a press briefing at the White House. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
